scripts.heroku:install: heroku -v || npm install heroku && heroku plugins:install heroku-repo && heroku plugins:install heroku-pg-exstras
scripts.heroku:install:win: heroku -v || npm install heroku && heroku plugins:install heroku-repo && heroku plugins:install heroku-pg-exstras
scripts.heroku:db:attach: heroku addons |grep '^heroku-postgresql\s' && echo Attaching database of app $1 as variable $2 not yet supported
scripts.heroku:db:backup: heroku addons |grep '^heroku-postgresql\s' && heroku pg:backups:capture --app $APP_NAME && heroku pg:backups:download --app $APP_NAME
scripts.heroku:db:restore:local: echo local database rerotration not yet supported
scripts.heroku:db:init: echo Initialization of the remote database from local not yet supported.
scripts.heroku:db:init:local: echo local database initialization not yet supported
scripts.heroku:db:destroy: echo Destroying database ${1:-heroku-postgresql} not supported && heroku addons:destory ${1:-heroku-postgresql}
scripts.heroku:deploy: npm run build && git push heroku heroku:main
scripts.heroku:deploy:win: npm run build && git push heroku heroku:main
